<Meta title="Templates/Components/GridView" />

# Default Grid View Factory

```jsx
const defaultSkimmingViewOptions = {
	margin: 'dense',
	toolbarVariant: 'dense',
	Layout: ColumnsLayout(2)
};

const defaultGridViewDropSettings = {
	multiple : true,
	limit : -1,
	maxSize : 1024 * 1024 * 20
};

const withGridViewOnceOverView = withGridViewSkimming(defaultSkimmingViewOptions);

const DefaultGridViewFactory = (props) => {

	const {Component = GridView, QuickSearchComponent = null, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedGridView = R.compose(
		withSnackbar,
		withGridViewConfigLoader,
		withGridViewOnceOverView,
		withGridViewLocalPreferences,
		withGridViewSettings(defaultGridViewSettings),
		withGridViewRecentHistory,
		withGridViewQuickSearch(QuickSearchComponent),
		withGridViewExportActions,
		withGridViewDefaultActions,
		withGridViewModelBulkActions,
		withGridViewRowActions,
		withGridViewActionExecutor,
		withCriteriaStateListener(null),
		withGridViewQueryLoader,
		withGridViewSorting,
		withGridViewSelection,
		withGridViewPagination,
		withGridViewDrop(defaultGridViewDropSettings)
	)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedGridView {...otherProps}>
			{children}
		</ComposedGridView>
	);
};
```
